block.p: OMNISKY CORP., Palo Alto, Calif., a wireless Internet services provider, said News Corp. would invest $60 million for a 10 percent stake in the company.

MCN ENERGY GROUP INC., Detroit, the owner of a Michigan natural gas utility, agreed to sell its 95 percent stake in a New Mexico power project to Delta Power Co.. It was the last power plant it had to sell before its purchase by DTE Energy Co. Terms were not disclosed.
OMNISKY CORP., Palo Alto, Calif., a wireless Internet services provider, said News Corp. would invest $60 million for a 10 percent stake in the company.

MCN ENERGY GROUP INC., Detroit, the owner of a Michigan natural gas utility, agreed to sell its 95 percent stake in a New Mexico power project to Delta Power Co.. It was the last power plant it had to sell before its purchase by DTE Energy Co. Terms were not disclosed.
CNH GLOBAL N.V., Racine, Wis., the world's largest maker of farm tractors, agreed to sell its stake in a farm-equipment venture to its partner in the venture, Agco Corp., for an undisclosed amount.
POLICY MANAGEMENT SYSTEMS CORP., Blythewood, S.C., a software company, which is considering two competing takeover offers, has changed its name to Mynd.
